com.learning.sandwich.sandy

Class ResponseViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
      • androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
        • com.learning.sandwich.sandy.ResponseViewModel

  • public class ResponseViewModel
extends androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
    The view model can be thought of as the duct work in and out of a given fragment using different threads, database tasks, live data (reactive coding) or some combination thereof; in this case, all of the above.

      • getTrainingSandwiches

        public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<Sandwich>> getTrainingSandwiches()
        Returns:
        retrieves all sandwiches not designated by the user to be of a non-sandwich category (a lugubrious double negative but most accurately conveys the method's function)
